::Grounded::
"Yea if he comes down here....'
"hey you rusted tin can....come fight me on the ground...or are you
scared..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Windlord::
>
> "Can you handle the new comer while I fight with this one?" said the
> male
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Grounded::
> > Grounded sees the new bot come in and calls out"Hey come get me you
> > peice of scrap" in an attempt to even the odds...
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > ::Dead-End::
> > > He had left later than Wildrider, and was just flying into at the
> > > scene. He sees Wildrider, up high, and follows, firing two Psi
> > > punches from his Air-compression cannon at Windlord. "Haha, hey
> > > Wildrider, guess who just joined the party."
> > >
> > >
> > > On 31 Mar 2001, at 6:51, airly2000@y... wrote:
> > >
> > > > Windlord::
> > > >
> > > > "I can handle him" said the hawk while he shoot 25 times agaisnt
> > > > Wildrider...
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > > ::Grounded::
> > > > > "Shit , i cant do anyting while he is up there...." he said to
> > > > > himself....He glanced down and saw some oil leaking out from
> where
> > > > he
> > > > > was kniked by Wildrider's scatter shot..."I am clear out of
> ideas"
> > > > he
> > > > > relayed to Wind " and i am basically usless right now....can
> u out
> > > > run
> > > > > him...?"
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > > > > > Wildrider tries to swerve up and around dodging the gun
> blasts.
> > > > > "Dammit" he
> > > > > > yells, but there are to many. They nick and graze him,
> puncturing
> > > > small
> > > > > > holes where they hit, and he soars upwards to get away. He
> wasnt
> > > > stupid,
> > > > > > even though he acted it. He was outnumbered, and needed to
> keep

> > > > > one on
